item.title: howdy
item.description: There he goes. One of God’s own prototypes. A high-powered mutant of some kind never even considered for mass production. Too weird to live, and too rare to die. Hunter S. Thompson, Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas int main(void) { return 1337; }
